tumbled through the -> starry : 1
through the starry -> and : 1
the starry and -> then : 1
starry and then -> i : 1
then i landed -> in : 1
i landed in -> a : 1
landed in a -> moist : 1
in a moist -> pile : 1
a moist pile -> of : 1
moist pile of -> cow : 1
pile of cow -> sliding : 1
of cow sliding -> a : 1
cow sliding a -> few : 1
sliding a few -> feet : 1
few feet so -> that : 1
feet so that -> it : 1
that it smeared -> a : 1
it smeared a -> perfect : 1
smeared a perfect -> streak : 1
a perfect streak -> from : 1
perfect streak from -> chest : 1
streak from chest -> to : 1
from chest to -> i : 1
chest to i -> heard : 1
heard a surprised -> and : 1
a surprised and -> then : 1
surprised and then -> a : 1
then a knee -> ground : 1
a knee ground -> me : 1
knee ground me -> into : 1
ground me into -> the : 1
into the cold -> mashing : 1
the cold mashing -> the : 1
cold mashing the -> molecular : 1
mashing the molecular -> particles : 1
the molecular particles -> of : 1
molecular particles of -> shit : 1
particles of shit -> firmly : 1
of shit firmly -> between : 1
shit firmly between -> each : 1
firmly between each -> individual : 1
between each individual -> fiber : 1
each individual fiber -> of : 1
individual fiber of -> my : 1
fiber of my -> steel : 1
of my steel -> clamped : 1
my steel clamped -> around : 1
steel clamped around -> my : 1
clamped around my -> got : 1
around my got -> he : 1
my got he -> came : 1
got he came -> i : 1
he came i -> help : 1
came i help -> i : 1
i help i -> began : 1
help i began -> to : 1
to laugh hard -> despite : 1
laugh hard despite -> the : 1
hard despite the -> lingering : 1
despite the lingering -> pain : 1
the lingering pain -> of : 1
lingering pain of -> farewell : 1
pain of farewell -> i : 1
of farewell i -> bellowed : 1
farewell i bellowed -> between : 1
i bellowed between -> think : 1
bellowed between think -> hopped : 1
between think hopped -> up : 1
think hopped up -> on : 1
hopped up on -> probably : 1
up on probably -> judging : 1
on probably judging -> from : 1
probably judging from -> all : 1
judging from all -> this : 1
from all this -> cow : 1
all this cow -> a : 1
this cow a -> new : 1
cow a new -> voice : 1
new voice presumably -> the : 1
voice presumably the -> just : 1
presumably the just -> take : 1
the just take -> him : 1
just take him -> we : 1
take him we -> have : 1
him we have -> a : 1
a few questions -> for : 1
few questions for -> him : 1
questions for him -> about : 1
for him about -> his : 1
him about his -> choked : 1
about his choked -> on : 1
his choked on -> my : 1
on my your -> copy : 1
my your copy -> of : 1
your copy of -> obsidian : 1
copy of obsidian -> son : 1
